name: Suicide Explorer
description:
Hy there!.. lets play a simple game you will be inside a maze and you have to reach the end and in the mean time i will try to kill you!!!

Side Note:

If HTML hangs during game, you can try downloading the game or refresh the page. 

Don't even try to destroy my minions they are indestructible   
You are only meant to play till "Level 2"
And if the camera behaves oddly, try pressing the "Space Bar"
